summary: Start Skyrim with a sweet melody and a epic video trailer instead of the classic Bethesda intro
descriptionHtml:
Hi guys,
This is my first content, so please be constructive and tell me your remarks.

 ************************************************************************************************************************************

This mod will replace your old Bethesda introduction by a new immersive extract that i personally like.
The trailer is more longer than the orginal ( ~5 to ~50 sec) so if you are hurry do not install it.

1.1) A shorter version ( only 15 sec ) is now available for the impatient ! 

Watch the video before installing here : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rXNNzY1U9kw
 
 ************************************************************************************************************************************

How to install :

1) Download the file \"BGS_logo.bik\"
2) Go to (C:/Program Files/The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim/Data/Video) and delete the current file \"BGS_logo.bik\" ( Save it if you want to back to the older version later )
3) Copy and paste the new \"BGS_logo.bik\" from the folder to this path (C:/Program Files/The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim/Data/Video)

Launch Skyrim and enjoy this epic trailer !

 ************************************************************************************************************************************

Credits :

Original video by ChrisSketch -> http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rbJw2R-dtxQ ( Cover by malufenix )
